room_title: Escape room "Mafia Bomb Squad" by The Great Escape Clovis in Fresno
room_description: Set in a 1920's underground casino, this room is a speakeasy frequented by gangsters like Al Capone, Baby Face Nelson and Bugsy Siegel. They were tipped off that there was going to be a raid so they planted a bomb in the room. As the bomb squad, your job is to find the bomb, disarm it and escape before it's too late.
